summary: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

Grimes|Annabel Maule|Benny Young|Sbish Trzebinski|Allaudin Qureshi|Niven Boyd|Iman|Peter Strong|Abdulla Sunado|Amanda Parkin|Muriel Gross|Ann Palmer|Keith Pearson
